original: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ āsavasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho naāsavasampayutto
analyzed: ▁an idassanaappaṭigh aṃ ▁āsav asampayutt aṃ ▁dhammaṃ ▁paṭicca ▁na an idassanaappaṭigh o ▁na āsav asampayutt o

original: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ āsavasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
nasanidassanasappaṭigho naāsavasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe… anidassanaappaṭighaṁ
analyzed: ▁nasanidassanas a ppaṭi gh o ▁na āsav asampayutt o ▁dhammo ▁uppajjati ▁hetupaccayā ▁pe ▁an idassanaappaṭigh aṃ

original: āsavasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho naāsavasampayutto ca naanidassanasappaṭigho
analyzed: ▁āsav asampayutt aṃ ▁dhammaṃ ▁paṭicca ▁nasanidassanas a ppaṭi gh o ▁na āsav asampayutt o ▁ca ▁na a nidassan a sappaṭigh o

original: naāsavasampayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe
Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ āsavavippayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho naāsavavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
